title: Ed Miliband – 2021 Comments on Economic Support for Businesses
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ed Miliband, the Shadow Business Secretary, on 10 June 2021.
content:
Businesses have operated under historic uncertainty during this crisis, worsened by details of economic support playing catch up with public health announcements.
